title: Blog-Based Beginner Spanish Conversation and Cultural Understanding Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Spanish greetings and alphabet comprehension
context.additional_context: Spanish language learning focused on daily and workplace contexts for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields

learning_goals: Learners can produce daily conversational sentences using basic Spanish grammar structures with 80% accuracy.
Learners can explain three or more aspects of Spanish-speaking cultures by analyzing images/videos in blog posts.
Learners utilize more than 10 job-related Spanish vocabulary terms through weekly blog assignments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
